body_html:
Running

os.system('mkdir -p {}'.format( summaries_directory ))

does get rid of the race condition -- or, rather, lets linux handle the race condition, and that fixes my particular problem.

I agree with @jsseely that it'd be super nice to have TF handle this internally though.
body_text:
Running
os.system('mkdir -p {}'.format( summaries_directory ))
does get rid of the race condition -- or, rather, lets linux handle the race condition, and that fixes my particular problem.
I agree with @jsseely that it'd be super nice to have TF handle this internally though.
body:
Running
```python
os.system('mkdir -p {}'.format( summaries_directory ))
```
does get rid of the race condition -- or, rather, lets linux handle the race condition, and that fixes my particular problem.

I agree with @jsseely that it'd be super nice to have TF handle this internally though.
